title: Makra Kome
description: An ancient settlement and fortification in the upper Spercheios river valley, located near modern Varibopi in Greece.

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 7951

properties.description: Possible location of a lower settlement of Makra Kome, after Roux (1954, 89-94). Verified in Google Earth.
properties.title: Possible Lower Settlement Location

properties.description: The possible location of the acropolis, according to Stählin (1924, 224) and Béquignon (1937, 316).
properties.title: Acropolis?
